user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send me (contact@medtechsolutions.com) an update about Greenleaf Health Center’s needs for the upcoming software update, and remind her she can review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Greenleaf Health Center’s Needs for Upcoming Software Update

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an update on Greenleaf Health Center’s operational needs for our upcoming software release to contact@medtechsolutions.com at your earliest convenience?  

Feel free to review your Gmail and Notion workspaces for any notes or details that might help compile the information.

Thank you very much for your assistance!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
MedTech Solutions

final_output:
